## Dashboard for Company & Talent

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(reactable)
library(googlesheets4)
library(googleAuthR)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
df_bi_muamalat <- read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1w6A1mzza4fdp1FDpi0x7wWZaP0ycVR-y7TWBQ7GZuCE", range = "Bank Muamalat - Business Intelligence Analyst")
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

df_bi_muamalat <- df_bi_muamalat |> 
  mutate(`Total Time (hour)` = round(`Total Time (hour)`, digits = 2))

df_bi_muamalat <- df_bi_muamalat |> 
  filter(State %in% c("in_progress", "completed"))

df_bi_muamalat_clean <- df_bi_muamalat[ , c("Name", "Email", "Phone Number", "Batch VIX", "State", "Advance Task Submission File 1", "Total Score", "Total Time (hour)")]
```


```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

sticky_style <- list(backgroundColor = "#f7f7f7")


reactable(df_bi_muamalat_clean, wrap = FALSE,
  resizable = TRUE,
  bordered = TRUE,
  defaultSorted = list(`Batch VIX` = "asc",
                       `State` = "asc",
                       `Total Score` = "desc", 
                       `Total Time (hour)` = "asc"),
  filterable = TRUE, 
  fullWidth = TRUE,
  defaultPageSize = 50,
  minRows = 10,
          columns = list(`Advance Task Submission File 1` = colDef(html = TRUE, cell = function(value, index) {
      sprintf('<a href="%s" target="_blank">%s</a>', df_bi_muamalat_clean$`Advance Task Submission File 1`[index], value)
    })
  ))
```
